title: Kovai Limited and Synegrate Sign Mutual Agreement to Transition all Minotaur Customers to BizTalk360
text:
Kovai Limited announced that they have entered into a mutual agreement with Synegrate (a California based company) and will transition all of their existing Minotaur customers into their flagship product BizTalk360.
London (PRWEB) October 15, 2015
Kovai Limited announced that they have entered into a mutual agreement with Synegrate (a California based company) and will transition all of their existing Minotaur customers into their flagship product BizTalk360. “BizTalk360” is the market leading product when it comes to Microsoft BizTalk Server monitoring and administration . Minotaur was one of the early stage monitoring products for Microsoft BizTalk Server. (Minotaur was originally owned and maintained by Raging Bull Tech, and was later taken over by Synegrate).
Synegrate is focused on providing a superior customer experience in their consulting and service offerings when it comes to complex integration projects. While the Minotaur monitoring product filled a customer requirement a few years ago, it has since been superseded by superior niche focused products like BizTalk360.
Says Riaan Gouws (CTO, partner): “This partnership allows us to focus 100% on our services around on-premise BizTalk and Azure Service bus enterprise integration projects while still providing our customers with a best of breed monitoring product. We chose BizTalk360 as the preferred monitoring product for our customer base based on product maturity and value proposition.”
“When Johan and Riaan (founder of Minotaur) approached us and explained about their intention to transition Minotaur customers to BizTalk360, we were super excited. I feel they made the right decision by putting their customer’s interest first and keep their focus on their core strengths by serving their customers better by providing system integration solutions” said Saravana Kumar, Founder/CTO of Kovai Limited.
Both Kovai Limited and Synegrate will work closely together in making sure the transition is seamless for their existing Minotaur customers. The companies also signed mutual partner agreement to help each other in future business opportunities.
About Kovai Limited
Kovai Limited is a software development (ISV) company based in London. BizTalk360 is the flagship product of the company, designed to help BizTalk Server customers manage and monitor their environments efficiently and increase the return on investment. BizTalk360 is used by a wide variety of customers across different sectors. The product is currently used by over 360+ customers across 26+ countries in 1500+ BizTalk environments and it's growing rapidly.
For more information about BizTalk360, visit http://www.biztalk360.com
About Synegrate
Synegrate is a consulting firm specializing in Enterprise Application Integration and Business Process Management. (Based out of Costa Mesa, California, the company was established in 2004 as Inobits Inc., and later rebranded as Synegrate in 2014). The core objective of the company is to help customers bring together disparate systems, and design, build business processes and workflows in an agile and scalable manner thereby aiding organizations to unleash the potential of their existing investments in solutions.
For more information about Synegrate, visit http://www.synegrate.com
